Nick's Blog

Forums back up

19 July 2006

A while ago I had a forum setup for general discussion and support. I had a real hard time with it because of the huge amount of spam I was getting. I've decided to give it another go with Vanilla. Check it out and if you want to you can create an account and get involved.
